member.name: P:EasyPost.Credentials.Visibility
member.summary: There are five possible values, which encode the security need and storage type for each attribute: "visible", "checkbox", "fake", "password", and "masked"

member.name: P:EasyPost.Credentials.Label
member.summary: Most attributes have generic names, so for clarity a "label" value is provided for clearer representation when rendering forms

member.name: P:EasyPost.CarrierField.AutoLink
member.summary: If this key is present with the value of true, no other attributes are needed for CarrierAccount creation

member.name: P:EasyPost.CarrierField.CustomWorkflow
member.summary: If this key is present with the value of true, CarrierAccount creation of this type requires extra work not handled by the CarrierAccount standard API

member.name: P:EasyPost.CarrierField.Credentials
member.summary: If this object is present, required attribute names and their metadata are presented inside

member.name: P:EasyPost.CarrierField.TestCredentials
member.summary: If this object is present, it contains attribute names and metadata just as the credentials object. It is not required for CarrierAccount creation if you do not plan on using the carrier account for test mode

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.AdditionalHandling
member.summary: Setting this option to true, will add an additional handling charge. An Additional Handling charge may be applied to the following: . Any article that is encased in an outside shipping container made of metal or wood. . Any item, such as a barrel, drum, pail or tire, that is not fully encased in a corrugated cardboard shipping container. . Any package with the longest side exceeding 60 inches or its second longest side exceeding 30 inches. . Any package with an actual weight greater than 70 pounds.

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.AddressValidationLevel
member.summary: Setting this option to "0", will allow the minimum amount of address information to pass the validation check. Only for USPS postage.

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.Alcohol
member.summary: Set this option to true if your shipment contains alcohol. . UPS - only supported for US Domestic shipments . FedEx - only supported for US Domestic shipments . Canada Post - Requires adult signature 19 years or older.If you want adult signature 18 years or older, instead use delivery_confirmation: ADULT_SIGNATURE

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.BillReceiverAccount
member.summary: Setting an account number of the receiver who is to receive and buy the postage. . UPS - bill_receiver_postal_code is also required

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.BillReceiverPostalCode
member.summary: Setting a postal code of the receiver account you want to buy postage. . UPS - bill_receiver_account also required

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.BillThirdPartyAccount
member.summary: Setting an account number of the third party account you want to buy postage. . UPS - bill_third_party_country and bill_third_party_postal_code also required

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.BillThirdPartyCountry
member.summary: etting a country of the third party account you want to buy postage. . UPS - bill_third_party_account and bill_third_party_postal_code also required

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.BillThirdPartyPostalCode
member.summary: Setting a postal code of the third party account you want to buy postage. . UPS - bill_third_party_country and bill_third_party_account also required

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.ByDrone
member.summary: Setting this option to true will indicate to the carrier to prefer delivery by drone, if the carrier supports drone delivery.

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.CarbonNeutral
member.summary: Setting this to true will add a charge to reduce carbon emissions.

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.CodAddressId
member.summary: COD address Id

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.Currency
member.summary: Which currency this shipment will show for rates if carrier allows.

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.Incoterm
member.summary: Incoterm negotiated for shipment. Supported values are "EXW", "FCA", "CPT", "CIP", "DAT", "DAP", "DDP", "FAS", "FOB", "CFR", and "CIF". Setting this value to anything other than "DDP" will pass the cost and responsibility of duties on to the recipient of the package(s), as specified by Incoterms rules.

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.DeliveryConfirmation
member.summary: If you want to request a signature, you can pass "ADULT_SIGNATURE" or "SIGNATURE". You may also request "NO_SIGNATURE" to leave the package at the door. . All - some options may be limited for international shipments

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.DryIce

member.name: P:EasyPost.Options.DryIceMedical
member.summary: If the dry ice is for medical use, set this option to true. . UPS - Need dry_ice_weight to be set . UPS MailInnovations - Need dry_ice_weight to be set

member.name: P:EasyPost.EasyPostObject.Reference
member.summary: Many API objects also have an optional reference field that may be assigned during creation. The reference values you assign may be used in place of id values in many API endpoints, but we recommend using the EasyPost-assigned id instead because ids are guaranteed to be unique within the system, while reference uniqueness is not enforced.

member.name: F:EasyPost.EasyPostObject.RequestError
member.summary: Request error for the requests get stored here rather than throwing exceptions which wreaks havoc in an Async environment. This value is filled in if there was a reques error with the error details. This is not a property so it is never sent over the wire and only filled in by the request code.
